Wukong: The Monkey King

Release Date: February 21, 2011

Wukong, also known as the Monkey King, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. He was released on February 21, 2011, and has since become a beloved and iconic character in the game. With his agility, cunning, and mischievous nature, Wukong brings a unique playstyle to the Summoner's Rift.

The Legend of Wukong

Wukong's story is deeply rooted in Chinese mythology. According to the ancient legends, Wukong was born from a stone egg on the mystical Mountain of Flowers and Fruit. He possessed incredible strength and agility, making him a formidable opponent to anyone who dared to challenge him. Wukong's desire for power led him to seek immortality, and he embarked on a journey to learn the secrets of the gods.

After countless trials and tribulations, Wukong eventually became the disciple of the powerful Taoist master, Subhuti. Under Subhuti's guidance, Wukong honed his skills and learned the art of transformation, allowing him to take on various forms and shapes. With his newfound abilities, Wukong became known as the Monkey King, revered and feared by all.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Wukong is a versatile champion who excels in both offense and defense. His kit allows him to engage in team fights, assassinate squishy targets, and escape dangerous situations. One of his greatest strengths is his ability to deceive enemies with his decoy, which can confuse opponents and provide opportunities for strategic plays.

His passive ability, Stone Skin, grants him bonus armor and magic resistance, making him naturally tanky and resilient. This allows Wukong to withstand heavy damage and survive in team fights. Additionally, his Q ability, Crushing Blow, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage and reducing the enemy's armor. This ability synergizes well with his ultimate, Cyclone, which deals massive area-of-effect damage and knocks up enemies.

However, Wukong also has his weaknesses. He heavily relies on his abilities to deal damage, making him vulnerable when his abilities are on cooldown. Additionally, he lacks sustain and can be easily poked down by ranged champions in the laning phase. Wukong's ultimate ability, while powerful, requires him to be in the midst of the enemy team, making him susceptible to crowd control and burst damage.

Wukong's Background in the Game

In League of Legends, Wukong is primarily played in the top lane or the jungle. His high mobility and burst damage make him a strong pick for players who enjoy aggressive playstyles. Wukong's ability to engage and disrupt team fights makes him a valuable asset to any team composition.

Wukong's playstyle revolves around utilizing his decoy to confuse enemies and initiate fights. By using his W ability, Decoy, Wukong can create a clone of himself, which can be controlled to deceive opponents. This ability can be used to escape dangerous situations, initiate ganks, or confuse enemies in team fights.

His E ability, Nimbus Strike, allows Wukong to dash to a target enemy, dealing damage and granting him attack speed for a short duration. This ability can be used to engage or disengage from fights, as well as to quickly clear jungle camps when playing as a jungler.

Wukong's ultimate ability, Cyclone, is a game-changer. When activated, Wukong spins around, damaging and knocking up enemies in the area. This ability can turn the tide of team fights and is especially devastating when combined with crowd control abilities from his teammates.

Explore Wukong's Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Wukong's skins. From the classic Radiant Wukong to the fearsome Jade Dragon Wukong, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer a more traditional look or want to embrace the mystical side of Wukong, there is a skin that suits your taste.

Wukong's skins not only change his appearance but also add new visual effects and sound effects to his abilities, enhancing the overall gameplay experience. Whether you want to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies with the Underworld Wukong skin or showcase your style with the Lancer Stratus Wukong skin, our website has you covered.

So, what are you waiting for? Visit our website and dive into the world of Wukong's skins. Unleash the power of the Monkey King and make a statement on the battlefield!

Wukong (Volcanic Wukong)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 10, 2011

Volcanic Wukong is a fiery and explosive skin that brings a whole new level of intensity to the Monkey King. Released on November 10, 2011, this skin offers players a visually stunning and thematically fitting alternative to Wukong's classic appearance. Priced at 975 RP, it is a popular choice among players who want to add a touch of volcanic power to their games.

The Volcanic Wukong skin transforms Wukong into a fearsome warrior engulfed in flames. His fur turns a fiery red, and molten lava courses through his veins, giving him an otherworldly and menacing presence on the battlefield. The skin also features new visual effects, such as fiery particle effects on his abilities, making each strike feel like a volcanic eruption.

Wukong's staff, known as the

is also given a volcanic makeover. It becomes a blazing weapon, with lava flowing down its length and flames emanating from its tip. This weapon perfectly complements Wukong's new appearance, adding to the overall theme of volcanic power and destruction.

Now, let's delve into the story of Wukong and his place in the League of Legends universe. Wukong, also known as the Monkey King, is a champion inspired by the classic Chinese novel

In the game, Wukong is a highly mobile and versatile champion who excels at both dealing damage and disrupting his opponents.

Wukong's lore tells the tale of a mischievous and ambitious monkey who seeks immortality and recognition. He embarks on a journey to learn the secrets of the world and become a legendary figure. Along the way, he encounters various challenges and adversaries, showcasing his cunning and combat prowess.

In the game, Wukong's abilities reflect his agility and trickery. His passive ability,
grants him bonus armor and magic resistance, making him more durable in fights. His Q ability,
allows him to strike his enemies with a powerful staff attack, reducing their armor and dealing bonus damage. His W ability,
creates a clone of himself, confusing enemies and allowing him to escape or engage in combat. His E ability,
sends him soaring through the air, damaging and knocking up enemies in his path. Finally, his ultimate ability,

unleashes a whirlwind that damages and knocks up all nearby enemies, making him a force to be reckoned with in team fights.

Wukong's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. With his high mobility and crowd control, he can quickly dive into the backline and wreak havoc among squishy targets. His deceptive clone ability also allows him to outplay opponents and escape dangerous situations. Additionally, his ultimate ability provides a significant area of effect damage, making him a valuable asset in team fights.

However, Wukong also has his weaknesses. He lacks sustain and can be easily burst down if caught out of position. His reliance on his abilities for damage means that he can struggle against champions who can interrupt his combos or negate his burst. Additionally, his clone ability can be easily countered by experienced players who can distinguish the real Wukong from the clone.

Overall, Wukong is a champion with a rich lore and a unique playstyle. Whether you prefer his classic appearance or the volcanic fury of the Volcanic Wukong skin, he is a formidable force on the Rift. If you want to learn more about Wukong and his various appearances, including the Volcanic Wukong skin, you can find information and videos on this page.

Wukong (Elderwood Wukong)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: September 2021

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Wukong, a mischievous trickster who has recently received a stunning new skin called

This article will delve into the story behind this enchanting costume and explore all the intricate details that make it a must-have for Wukong enthusiasts.

Elderwood Wukong is a skin that transports Wukong into the mystical realm of the Elderwood, a magical forest teeming with ancient spirits and ethereal creatures. This skin transforms Wukong into a majestic being, adorned with intricate wooden armor and glowing, nature-infused particles. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, as every aspect of Wukong's appearance has been meticulously crafted to embody the essence of the Elderwood.

One of the standout features of Elderwood Wukong is his staff, which has been transformed into a magnificent wooden weapon adorned with leaves and vines. The staff emanates a soft, green glow, further emphasizing the connection between Wukong and the natural world. Additionally, Wukong's abilities have been given a stunning makeover, with each skill showcasing the beauty and power of the Elderwood. From his shimmering decoy to his devastating cyclone, every ability animation is a visual treat for players and spectators alike.

Now, let's take a moment to delve into the lore of Wukong and understand his place in the League of Legends universe. Wukong, also known as the Monkey King, hails from a distant land called Ionia. He is a trickster and a warrior, known for his agility and cunning. Wukong's journey began when he discovered a powerful staff hidden within an ancient temple. With this newfound weapon, he set out on a quest to prove himself as a formidable warrior.

Wukong's strengths lie in his ability to deceive and outmaneuver his opponents. His nimble movements and clone ability make him a slippery target, often leaving enemies confused and vulnerable. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Cyclone, allows him to spin in a whirlwind of destruction, dealing damage to all nearby enemies. Wukong's versatility and high burst damage make him a formidable force in team fights and skirmishes.

However, Wukong also has his weaknesses. He lacks sustain and can be easily burst down if caught off guard. Additionally, his reliance on his clone ability makes him predictable to experienced players who can quickly identify the real Wukong. It is crucial for Wukong players to master the art of deception and carefully choose their engagements to maximize their impact on the battlefield.

In the world of League of Legends, Wukong has become a beloved champion, known for his mischievous nature and impressive combat skills. He has found his place as a top laner, where his ability to engage and disrupt team fights is highly valued. Wukong's versatility allows him to adapt to various playstyles, making him a popular pick among both casual and professional players.

If you're interested in exploring all the different appearances of Wukong, including the mesmerizing Elderwood Wukong skin, you're in luck. On this page, you can find a wealth of information, videos, and images showcasing Wukong's various costumes. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or eager to discover the enchanting Elderwood Wukong, this page is your ultimate resource for all things Wukong.

So, what are you waiting for? Dive into the captivating world of Wukong and witness the magic of the Elderwood firsthand. Unleash your inner trickster and embrace the power of nature with the stunning Elderwood Wukong skin. Whether you're a seasoned Wukong player or new to his captivating story, this skin is sure to leave you in awe.

Wukong (Lancer Stratus Wukong)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: March 5, 2020

Wukong, the Monkey King, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his agility, deception, and mastery of the staff, Wukong has become a fan-favorite since his release in 2011. Over the years, Wukong has received various skins, each offering a unique visual and thematic twist to his character. One such skin is the

which was released on March 5, 2020.

The

skin transforms the Monkey King into a formidable knight, clad in shining armor and wielding a majestic lance. This skin takes inspiration from the medieval fantasy genre, giving Wukong a regal and heroic appearance. With its intricate details and vibrant colors, the

skin truly stands out on the battlefield.

One of the most striking features of the

skin is the visual effects it brings to Wukong's abilities. His abilities are enhanced with new animations, particle effects, and sound effects, all tailored to match the knightly theme. From his Q ability,
to his ultimate ability,

every move Wukong makes exudes power and elegance.

Additionally, the

skin also includes new recall animations and a unique model for Wukong's clone, adding further depth to the skin's overall design. The attention to detail in this skin truly showcases the dedication and creativity of the League of Legends design team.

Now, let's delve into the story of Wukong and his journey in the game. Wukong, also known as Sun Wukong, is based on the legendary figure from Chinese mythology. In League of Legends, Wukong is a trickster and a warrior, utilizing his agility and cunning to outsmart his opponents. His lore tells the tale of a mischievous monkey who seeks immortality and recognition.

Wukong's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. With his nimble movements and deceptive clone, he excels at confusing his opponents and creating chaos in team fights. His Q ability,
allows him to deal significant damage to a single target, while his W ability,

grants him the ability to vanish and leave behind a clone, confusing enemies and providing an escape tool.

However, Wukong also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He lacks sustain and can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his reliance on his clone for deception means that experienced players can quickly identify the real Wukong and negate his tricks. Proper positioning and timing are crucial for Wukong players to maximize their impact in the game.

In the League of Legends community, Wukong has become a beloved champion, known for his versatility and playmaking potential. He is often seen in the top lane or the jungle, where his ability to initiate fights and disrupt the enemy team can turn the tide of battle. Wukong's popularity has led to him being a staple pick in both casual and professional play, making him a force to be reckoned with on the Rift.

If you want to explore more about Wukong and his various appearances, this page is the perfect resource for you. Here, you can find information, videos, and images of all the skins available for Wukong, including the majestic

skin. Immerse yourself in the world of the Monkey King and experience the thrill of playing as this iconic champion.

Whether you're a fan of Wukong's lore, a dedicated player looking to master his abilities, or simply someone who appreciates the artistry behind the
skin, this page has something for everyone. Discover the legend of Wukong and unleash his power on the battlefield!

Wukong (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Wukong, the Monkey King, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the original champions, Wukong has become a fan favorite with his unique abilities and engaging gameplay. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Wukong's default costume and explore all the intricate details of this iconic skin.

The Story of Wukong's Default Costume

Wukong's default costume represents his original appearance in the game. Clad in traditional Chinese-inspired armor, Wukong embodies the essence of the Monkey King from ancient Chinese mythology. The costume features a vibrant red and gold color scheme, symbolizing power, strength, and royalty. Wukong's attire includes a helmet adorned with a golden crown, a chest plate with intricate dragon motifs, and flowing robes that allow for swift and agile movements.

The attention to detail in Wukong's default costume is truly remarkable. From the intricate engravings on his armor to the carefully crafted textures, every aspect of the skin showcases the rich cultural heritage and mythical origins of the Monkey King. The designers at Riot Games have truly captured the essence of Wukong's character through this visually stunning skin.

Wukong's default costume also includes his iconic weapon, the staff known as the

This weapon is an extension of Wukong's power and agility, allowing him to unleash devastating attacks on his enemies. The Bo Staff is intricately designed with ornate carvings and a golden tip, further emphasizing Wukong's regal status.

The Legend of Wukong

Wukong's story is deeply rooted in Chinese mythology. According to legend, Wukong was born from a stone on the Mountain of Flowers and Fruit. He possessed incredible strength, agility, and the ability to transform into various forms. Seeking immortality, Wukong embarked on a journey to learn the secrets of the universe and gain ultimate power.

In League of Legends, Wukong is a versatile champion who excels in close combat and mobility. His abilities, inspired by his mythical origins, allow him to deceive his enemies, create clones, and unleash devastating strikes. Wukong's playstyle revolves around outmaneuvering opponents and using his agility to his advantage.

Wukong's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disrupt team fights. With his Nimbus Strike, Wukong can dash into the heart of the enemy team, dealing damage and knocking up multiple opponents. His Cyclone ability creates a whirlwind around him, damaging and knocking up enemies in the area. These crowd control abilities make Wukong a formidable force in team fights, allowing his allies to follow up and secure kills.

However, Wukong also has his weaknesses. He lacks sustain and can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his reliance on melee attacks makes him vulnerable to ranged champions who can kite him from a distance. Wukong players must carefully choose their engagements and utilize their mobility to avoid unfavorable situations.

Wukong's Place in the Game

Wukong has been a staple pick in the top lane for many seasons. His ability to trade effectively and escape ganks with his Decoy ability makes him a strong laner. In addition, his team fight presence and ability to initiate fights make him a valuable asset to any team composition.

Over the years, Wukong has received several updates and changes to his abilities to ensure a balanced gameplay experience. These changes have allowed Wukong to remain relevant in the ever-evolving meta of League of Legends. Whether played as a bruiser or an assassin, Wukong offers a unique playstyle that appeals to a wide range of players.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Wukong's appearances in the game. From his default costume to his various skins, each iteration of Wukong brings a fresh and exciting look to the champion. Explore the rich history and mythology behind Wukong and witness his evolution throughout the years.

Wukong (General Wukong)

RP Cost: 1350 | Release Date: November 19, 2020

General Wukong is a fearsome skin that transforms the Monkey King into a formidable warrior. Released on November 19, 2020, this skin brings a new level of power and authority to Wukong's appearance. With its intricate design and attention to detail, General Wukong is a must-have for any fan of the Monkey King.

The General Wukong skin showcases Wukong in a majestic and imposing armor, befitting of his title. The skin features a vibrant color scheme, with shades of gold and red dominating the design. Wukong's staff is transformed into a mighty spear, exuding strength and dominance. His abilities also receive a visual upgrade, with new animations and effects that enhance the overall experience of playing as General Wukong.

One of the standout features of the General Wukong skin is the attention to detail in the armor. From the intricate patterns etched into the plates to the flowing cape that billows behind him, every aspect of the skin exudes a sense of power and authority. The golden accents and regal design elements further emphasize Wukong's transformation into a true general.

Wukong's abilities receive a visual overhaul with the General Wukong skin. His Q ability,
now delivers a devastating strike with his spear, leaving a trail of red energy in its wake. His W ability,
sees Wukong vanish in a cloud of smoke, leaving behind a lingering red mist that adds an extra layer of mystery to his illusions. The E ability,
showcases Wukong's agility and precision as he dashes forward, leaving behind a trail of red energy. Finally, his ultimate ability,

unleashes a whirlwind of red energy, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Now, let's delve into the story of Wukong and explore his strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game of League of Legends.

The Story of Wukong

Wukong, also known as the Monkey King, is a champion deeply rooted in Chinese mythology. He is based on the legendary figure Sun Wukong from the classic Chinese novel

In League of Legends, Wukong is a highly mobile fighter who excels at engaging and disrupting his opponents.

Wukong's lore tells the tale of a mischievous and ambitious monkey who seeks immortality and recognition. After obtaining a powerful staff, he challenges the gods and wreaks havoc in heaven. However, his arrogance leads to his downfall, and he is imprisoned under a mountain for centuries. Eventually, Wukong is freed by the summoners of the League of Legends, where he now fights to prove his worth and regain his lost glory.

In the game, Wukong's strengths lie in his ability to engage and burst down enemies. His
ability allows him to deal significant damage to a single target, while his
enables him to quickly close the gap and engage in team fights. Wukong's ultimate ability,

is a powerful AoE ability that knocks up enemies and deals damage, making him a formidable force in team fights.

However, Wukong also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks sustain and can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his reliance on his abilities makes him vulnerable to crowd control effects that can interrupt his combos. Players must carefully time their engages and be mindful of their positioning to maximize Wukong's effectiveness.

Wukong has found his place in the game as a versatile top laner and jungler. His high mobility and ability to initiate fights make him a strong pick for teams looking to engage and create opportunities. Wukong's ability to deceive his opponents with his

ability also adds an element of unpredictability to his playstyle, making him a challenging champion to face.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Wukong's appearances, including the General Wukong skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or want to experience the power and authority of General Wukong, this page has everything you need to know about the Monkey King.

Wukong (Battle Academia Wukong)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: May 15, 2019

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that has captured the attention of players is

This skin transforms the Monkey King into a student of the prestigious Battle Academia, where he wields a magical staff and showcases his incredible martial arts skills.

As a member of the Battle Academia skin line, Wukong joins other champions who have embraced their academic side. This skin line takes inspiration from the popular anime genre, featuring champions as students in a magical academy. Battle Academia Wukong brings a fresh and exciting look to the champion, giving players a chance to experience Wukong in a whole new light.

The Battle Academia Wukong skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. It offers a significant visual upgrade to the base Wukong skin, with new animations, particle effects, and voice lines. The skin also includes unique recall animations and a new model for Wukong's staff, which adds to the overall thematic feel of the skin.

When playing as Battle Academia Wukong, players will notice the attention to detail in his design. Wukong dons a stylish Battle Academia uniform, complete with a red jacket, black pants, and white gloves. His staff is adorned with magical runes, emphasizing his connection to the arcane arts. The skin also features new visual effects for his abilities, such as his Nimbus Strike and Cyclone, which showcase his mastery of martial arts and magic.

Now, let's delve into the story of Wukong and his place in the League of Legends universe. Wukong, also known as the Monkey King, is a champion deeply rooted in Chinese mythology. In the game, Wukong is a highly mobile fighter who excels at engaging enemies and dealing damage in team fights. His kit revolves around his ability to dash into the fray, disrupt the enemy team, and unleash devastating area-of-effect damage.

Wukong's lore tells the tale of a mischievous monkey who seeks immortality and recognition. He embarks on a journey to prove himself worthy and eventually becomes the Monkey King, gaining immense power and the ability to transform into various forms. In the game, Wukong's ultimate ability, Cyclone, reflects his transformation abilities, as he spins around, damaging and knocking up enemies in his path.

Wukong's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. With his Nimbus Strike, he can dash onto priority targets, dealing damage and knocking them up. His Decoy ability allows him to deceive enemies, creating confusion and buying time for his team. In team fights, his Cyclone can turn the tide, dealing massive damage and crowd-controlling multiple enemies.

However, Wukong also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks sustain and can be easily burst down if caught out of position. His engage tools are powerful but can leave him vulnerable if not used wisely. Additionally, Wukong relies heavily on his ultimate ability for team fight impact, so timing and positioning are crucial for success.

In the League of Legends community, Wukong has become a beloved champion due to his playful personality and unique playstyle. He has found success in various roles, including top lane and jungle, and has been a staple pick in professional play at times. With the release of the Battle Academia Wukong skin, players have even more reason to embrace the Monkey King and showcase their skills in style.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Wukong's various appearances, including the Battle Academia Wukong skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or eager to explore the Battle Academia universe, Wukong offers a thrilling and dynamic gameplay experience that is sure to leave a lasting impression.

Wukong (Underworld Wukong)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 29, 2012

Underworld Wukong is a skin for the champion Wukong in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on October 29, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. With its unique design and thematic elements, Underworld Wukong offers players a fresh and exciting visual experience.

The Underworld Wukong skin transforms the Monkey King into a fearsome warrior from the depths of the underworld. Wukong's traditional golden armor is replaced with dark, shadowy armor adorned with glowing blue accents. His staff, known as the Monkey King's Magic Staff, is also given a sinister makeover, featuring a skull-shaped head and a haunting blue glow. This skin truly captures the essence of the underworld, making Wukong a formidable presence on the battlefield.

ability allows him to create a clone of himself, confusing opponents and making it difficult for them to target him. Wukong's ultimate ability,

unleashes a whirlwind that damages and knocks up enemies, making him a formidable team fighter.

However, Wukong also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He is relatively squishy compared to other fighters, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, Wukong relies heavily on his abilities to deal damage, so if his abilities are on cooldown, he may struggle to contribute to fights.

Wukong (Radiant Wukong)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: March 5, 2020

Wukong, the Monkey King, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his agility, cunning, and mischievous nature, Wukong has become a fan-favorite since his release. With his latest skin, Radiant Wukong, players can now experience a new and dazzling look for this iconic champion.

Radiant Wukong is a visually stunning skin that transforms Wukong into a radiant warrior. The skin features a vibrant color palette, with golden armor and glowing blue accents. Wukong's staff is also given a radiant makeover, emanating a brilliant light that adds to the overall celestial theme of the skin. The attention to detail in Radiant Wukong is truly remarkable, making it a must-have for any Wukong enthusiast.

But the beauty of Radiant Wukong is not just skin-deep. The skin also comes with unique visual and sound effects that enhance the gameplay experience. Wukong's abilities are given a celestial twist, with sparkling particles and ethereal sounds accompanying each move. From his nimble dashes to his devastating ultimate, every action feels more impactful and awe-inspiring with Radiant Wukong.

Now, let's delve into the story of Wukong and his place in the League of Legends universe. Wukong is based on the legendary figure Sun Wukong from the Chinese novel

In the game, Wukong is a trickster and a warrior, using his agility and cunning to outsmart his opponents. He excels in close combat, utilizing his staff and his clone ability to confuse and overwhelm his enemies.

Wukong's strengths lie in his mobility and burst damage. With his Nimbus Strike ability, he can quickly dash through enemies, dealing damage and leaving them vulnerable. His Crushing Blow ability allows him to deliver a powerful strike, shredding through armor and dealing massive damage. Additionally, his Cyclone ultimate ability creates a whirlwind around him, damaging and knocking up enemies caught in its path.

However, Wukong also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy compared to other melee champions, making him vulnerable to burst damage. Additionally, his clone ability can be easily countered by experienced players who can distinguish the real Wukong from his decoy. It requires careful positioning and timing to maximize Wukong's potential and avoid being caught off guard.

In the lore of League of Legends, Wukong is a mischievous and adventurous champion. He is a trickster who enjoys playing pranks on his fellow champions, often causing chaos and confusion on the battlefield. Despite his playful nature, Wukong is also a loyal friend and a formidable warrior. He fights for justice and honor, always striving to prove himself as the greatest warrior in the League.

Wukong's place in the game is versatile. He can be played in various roles, including top lane, jungle, and even mid lane. His mobility and burst damage make him a strong duelist, capable of outplaying opponents in one-on-one situations. In team fights, Wukong excels at diving into the enemy backline, disrupting their formation, and dealing significant damage to multiple targets.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Wukong, including his base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to explore the celestial beauty of Radiant Wukong, there is a skin for every Wukong enthusiast.

Wukong (Jade Dragon Wukong)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: March 5, 2020

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and captivating stories. One such champion is Wukong, the Monkey King, who has recently received a stunning new skin called Jade Dragon Wukong. This article will delve into the story behind this magnificent costume and explore all the intricate details that make it a must-have for any Wukong enthusiast.

Jade Dragon Wukong is a visually striking skin that draws inspiration from ancient Chinese mythology. The skin features Wukong adorned in ornate jade armor, complete with intricate dragon motifs. His staff, known as the Ruyi Jingu Bang, has been transformed into a majestic jade weapon, exuding power and elegance. The vibrant green color palette of the skin perfectly complements Wukong's playful and mischievous nature, while also paying homage to the rich cultural heritage of China.

Every aspect of Jade Dragon Wukong has been meticulously designed to capture the essence of this legendary creature. From the dragon-shaped shoulder pads to the dragon scales adorning his armor, the attention to detail is truly remarkable. The skin also features unique visual effects, such as jade particles and dragon-themed abilities, which further enhance the immersive experience of playing as Wukong.

Wukong, also known as Sun Wukong, is a champion deeply rooted in Chinese folklore. In League of Legends, he is portrayed as a highly mobile fighter who excels at engaging enemies and disrupting team fights. With his nimble movements and deceptive clones, Wukong is a formidable force on the battlefield.

According to his lore, Wukong was once a stone statue brought to life by the power of a magical staff. He possesses incredible strength, agility, and an unyielding spirit. Wukong's journey in the game revolves around his quest for enlightenment and his desire to prove himself as the greatest warrior in all of Runeterra.

Wukong's strengths lie in his ability to quickly close the gap between himself and his enemies, thanks to his Nimbus Strike ability. This allows him to swiftly dash through multiple targets, dealing damage and knocking them up in the process. His ultimate ability, Cyclone, creates a whirlwind around him, damaging and knocking up all nearby enemies, making him a potent team fighter.

However, Wukong also has his weaknesses. He lacks sustain in the early game, making him vulnerable to poke and harass from ranged champions. Additionally, his reliance on his abilities for damage leaves him susceptible to crowd control effects, as he has limited defensive options.

In the world of League of Legends, Wukong has become a beloved champion among players. His playful personality and iconic abilities have made him a fan favorite. With the release of the Jade Dragon Wukong skin, players now have the opportunity to experience Wukong's journey in a whole new light.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Wukong's appearances, including the mesmerizing Jade Dragon Wukong skin. Whether you're a dedicated Wukong main or simply appreciate the artistry behind the skins, Jade Dragon Wukong is a must-have addition to your collection.
